abort.single_instance_allowed: This integration has been set up, only one instance allowed.

user.description: You can get your username and password from [this page]({get_credentials_url}).

restart_required_after_setup.title: Restart Home Assistant Recommended
restart_required_after_setup.description: HA Tunnel integration ({integration_name}) has been successfully installed. It is recommended to restart Home Assistant to ensure all features work properly.

restart_required_after_config.title: Restart Home Assistant Required
restart_required_after_config.description: {integration_name} configuration completed! A restart is required for the tunnel settings to take effect.
